t: What brand or model of router does Amazon use for their network infrastructure? - Quora
s: Answer: I don't work for Amazon's IT departments or any of their data centers, my guess is the primary supplier is Cisco, I have been to data centers world wide and two things are true, almost no company uses a single brand of anything and Cisco is dominant among switch, router and appliance vend...
